MWC.GUI.Tools.Swing

Class MyBasicToolBarUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • javax.swing.plaf.ToolBarUI
        • javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicToolBarUI
          • MWC.GUI.Tools.Swing.MyBasicToolBarUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.SwingConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MyMetalToolBarUI

    public class MyBasicToolBarUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicToolBarUI
    A Basic L&F implementation of ToolBarUI. This implementation is a "combined" view/controller.

    Version:
    1.59 02/02/00
    Author:
    Georges Saab, Jeff Shapiro
